title: Annoying.
text:
I don‚Äôt like to spend money on apps such as games and music apps but premium üôÑ. I am not buying premium. It‚Äôs just no ads and all that. Well, why can‚Äôt you just make like 10 times less ads you know, maybe it would be less annoying.
Next, why can‚Äôt I just search for songs on my playlists instead of having to scroll through my 344+ song playlist. I have a life you know! 
Also, why do the same darn ads keep coming on! I memorized some. That‚Äôs when you know they have to stop playing the same ads! 
There are more problems but those are ones that bother me the most. I have never seen an app with this many ads. 
Anyways, I rated this a 3 because I at least get music but I listen to more ads then music and I know I should buy premium but I will not because I would like to see these problems fixed.
P.S. Another problem I have is lack of skips! I need more skips for the songs I dislike. I don‚Äôt like having to go to a different playlist just to listen to another bad song or having to suffer through that song. Oh and surprise! I can‚Äôt find the song on my playlist because I cannot search it on my playlist and I am busy! 

Thank you for reading this! Please try to fix these problems as soon as possible if you can. Thank you and I am sorry to be the complainer it‚Äôs just so fustrating. Thank you! 

             -Person

title: Random songs
text: Really like the app, but at times while listening to specific music in my personal library, random songs pop up and start playing. These are songs that aren't part of my genre, nor do I care to listen to. No disrespect intended, but I don't do pop, easy listening, hip hop. If I want to listen to this genre of music I will definitely add it to my library, but at least respect my picks for my library/playlist and allow my brand of music that I personally choose, to play without interruptions from other types of music. I also was offered a 3 month premium trial, with an option to continue or cancel premium after three months. I didn't get the opportunity to even use the trial premium, so I cancelled and still have the email. All in all not a bad app for music, lots of choices from any kind of music for making playlists.

title: it was better before
text: Before it didnt have as much ads but like now theres like 5 ads after like 6 songs i listen to. Also idk why this only happens to my phone only but the songs in my playlist are never in the order i put them and when i want to listen to one song there are 10 other songs shuffle with it and i cant even listen to it cause i have to listen to the other songsüòêlike i see how u want me to consider listening to the other song but i just wanna listen to the song i searched up. yall fr need to fix that because its really annoying. and also if i skip like a few songs a ad pops up.. like i just wanted to skip the song bro..üò≠ i think they doing all of this for people to get premium but its so annoying.. And  they need to fix the lyrics thing i just wanna see the lyrics and it just says  they cant play it or somethingüòë yall need to fix this its so annoying!

title: Apple Watch Suffers
text:
It‚Äôs such a struggle to use this app on the Apple Watch. I am using the Ultra and the two main issues I have are the following:

1) Downloads:
When downloading with the watch connected to a phone it for some reason just forever shows the downloading circle looping but never downloads the music. When it does download I‚Äôve had issues where I‚Äôm completely disconnected from my phone and I press play on my watch on a downloaded playlist and the play screen doesn‚Äôt update. It just never plays even though in Bluetooth my headphones are connected. Finally you can‚Äôt download single podcast episodes from the watch which is quite annoying.

2) listening 
It was a nightmare where I have a 50/50 chance of my headphones connecting to my watch when my phone is nearby. Half the time when I try to switch to my watch it just says ‚Äúfailed to connect try again later. Additionally, for some reason when I‚Äôm running disconnected from my phone after about 2-3 songs in the music just stops playing but the timer keeps going, when I press stop it goes back to the start of the song and when I press play it plays nothing but the timer ticks down and when I press pause it he same thing happens again and again until I just choose a new song or force restart.

I love the iPhone app but the Apple Watch especially in its offline mode is just insufferable to use a lot of the time.

title: Awful app
text: It worked great for the first few weeks, but after that, it became the worst music app I‚Äôve seen. First off, you cant rewind or repeat song‚Äôs, so you can only listen to the song once until it comes up on the playlist again. Second, instead of playing the actual song, it gives you a playlist with the song in it. If i wanted a playlist, i would play a playlist. Third, it adds songs to your custom playlist. If i didnt put it on the playlist, it means i dont want it on the playlist. Fourth, it stops playing a song in the middle of it, and when you try to keep playing it, it restarts the whole song. And finally, it has this stupid glitch where there‚Äôs no play button for the songs. I tried everything to fix it. I restarted the app, restared my phone, turning the wifi off and on again, using cellular data, but nothing worked. It wasnt something with the internet, because my other apps worked fine. After three days of waiting for the glitch to get fixed, I finally deleted it from my phone. I recommend using any other music app.

title: Most recent updated version (may2021)
text: I don‚Äôt know what y‚Äôall were thinking but this update ain‚Äôt it. One, my download albums aren‚Äôt showing up only half of the downloaded albums appear when I‚Äôm offline on that note the albums I have saved I can‚Äôt look at the list of songs in the album. When I go to the album from the artist profile it shows all the songs are downloaded the album also appears in the album section as well so like. But it doesn‚Äôt make sense how I open an album up and I can‚Äôt see the list of songs it only shows how many songs are in the album and how long the album is. Fix this yo üòÇ

title: why would u ban alex g online.
text: why would u ban the most best thing keeping me alive. it was like pieces to a puzzle for my heart. i live laugh love alex g online. i dont understand why you would do this to me. do you just hate happiness? you like depression? do you hate everything keeping me feeling whole again? you hate any good emotions that make people see the things that aren't negative right? or do you just hate contentment? alex g online was like my bestfriend in the whole wide world. without it i feel lonely and disconnected. i feel like you just wounded me banning alex g online. i am in dismay and in distress that you took it away from me. i feel devastated that you removed the only thing giving me that live laugh love feeling. I am exasperated that you separated the only thing that i truly loved in life. i feel troubled,disturbed, and feel disconnected from reality without alex g online.

title: Edit: Great Service, bad update to Recently Played
text:
The newest update changed the path taken from the ‚ÄúRecently Played‚Äù icons, which used to send you to your saved collection of that artist‚Äôs work. Now clicking on a recently played artist takes you to that artist‚Äôs page, rather than your saved collection of that artist‚Äôs work. I understand that this can help users discover more of the new music, but I have specific songs saved for a reason: they are the songs by that artist I enjoy and want to listen to again. Please change it back or make this a user prompted option. Otherwise the GUI is intuitive and helpful.

*** Edit 6/14 (Switching 4 stars to 1): When I wrote this review several months ago, I was slightly annoyed by the new GUI in the recently played. Boy, I did not realize how much worse it could get. This new update almost makes the app unusable for someone trying to find their music in any way similar to what has been standard for the last 5 years. Undo this update or I will switch to Apple Music. I don‚Äôt pay this much money for your designers, programmers, and managers to make their product worse.

title: Dislike new update
text:
Updated recently and the changes made to operating are frustrating. My normal use, is listening to my downloaded playlists. Before, I could select a song and the ‚Äúshuffle‚Äù option would stay on. This no longer happens, so it would play the order it‚Äôs in (alphabetical, easier to find by title). If you play outside the ‚Äúqueue‚Äù it will play in order no matter what.
My second issue which is even more frustrating, if when searching for a song within a playlist, the only music it will play is within that search. My most used playlist has 270+ songs, but a search for let‚Äôs say ‚ÄúPost Malone‚Äù will bring up all matches, but when I select, it will only play ‚ÄúPost Malone‚Äù instead of other songs on the playlist. 
Third, there was a step added to opening the queue. Before, you could pull up the ‚ÄúNow Playing‚Äù screen and just click on queue. Another step was added, not a big deal but feel it is not needed. The queue also also goes away after the next song starts which also did not happen before.

title: Love the app but hate the new update
text: I was listening to music on my PS4 when I realized that you guys deleted like 200+ of my music. Like why would you do that or have an update that does that. An its only for the phone. All my music is on the PS4 but when I go past or try to past the 800 song I can‚Äôt get to it ( on the phone I mean) . Plus, I have the app on automatic updates so I couldn‚Äôt choose weather I wanted to update it or not. I would love if you just put it back like the way it was. I use this app a lot between my Iphone and my PS4. I feel like it was much more convenient the way it was before. I have to admit the fact that I couldn‚Äôt see the rest of my song kinda forced me into writing this review I literally never do these but I felt like I had to in this case since I use this app sooo much. And the whole app this way is something I feel like I won‚Äôt be able to get used to with the way that it is set up now . Thank You for Coming to my TED TALK

title: Amazing app, it‚Äôs my go-to for music, but‚Ä¶
text: So, like I said, I love this app. It‚Äôs got all of my favorite songs, and there‚Äôs no issues or glitches or any reason for me to give this anything less than a five star review. But, I‚Äôd like one features to be added: Removing/hiding the ‚ÄúEpisodes for you‚Äù option. I don‚Äôt even listen to episodes, and yet they keep popping up. There‚Äôs this one that‚Äôs very inappropriate that‚Äôs lingering in the for you section, which makes no sense because, again, I don‚Äôt listen to that many episodes. Especially not inappropriate ones. It would be helpful if you could also remove episodes from your watch history, because the few times I did listen to them, I hated most of them and now they just won‚Äôt go away. I feel like adding this would be extremely helpful to other people with similar situations as mine.

title: Shuffle Problem
text:
I‚Äôm giving this app a 3 -Star rating because I love the recommendations, and how easy it is to use. However, I‚Äôve been having a terrible problem with random shuffling. I go to play a song in my ‚Äúliked songs‚Äù, and once the song is through it jumps back to the very first song in the list. I have 500+ songs I‚Äôve liked, and for some reason it resets each time a song completes. It‚Äôs so frustrating! It‚Äôs really bad in Car View - I could be jamming in my car and then have to manually change it to the next song I want to listen to instead of having it play in order. And no, it‚Äôs not on shuffle. I‚Äôve checked multiple times. Shuffle is turned off. 

Also, please bring back Bauhaus. Some of their best albums, The Sky‚Äôs Gone Out and Burning From the Inside are gone. üòûPlease see if you can bring them back?

title: Can I at least listen to whatever I want to?
text: I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs fair to only let premium users choose what they want to listen to, unlimited skipping, and a bunch of useless ads and I can‚Äôt even listen to my own playlist without getting frustrated. You might not care about this review. But Can you at least let me skip my songs, listen to whatever I want to, listen to my songs peacefully without having to deal with all these stupid ads, let me replay some parts of the song, and listen in whatever order I want. I tried to deal with it but I can‚Äôt. I can‚Äôt do in app purchases so I can‚Äôt get premium. I just want to listen to my music peacefully. Can‚Äôt the premium be something different? Do whatever you want but I just wanna listen to my music without all these annoying interruptions and frustrations. It‚Äôs difficult and annoying to deal with. And what‚Äôs the point of putting in the option in the thumbs down button for ads: ‚ÄúI just don‚Äôt want to listen to ads right now.‚Äù Who wants to listen to ads in the first place?? Please fix this. I just wanna listen to music in peace.

title: APP KEEPS PAUSING MUSIC - can‚Äôt deal anymore
text:
Then: for the first 6 months of having this app it was 5 star with great selection and working exactly as advertised. I got a premium subscription and I put it on my iPhone, my windows laptop, my Roku tv and my car. When I would go to my car the song just picked up from where I left off in my house, it was beautiful.

Now: for the last month or so, at least once a day, playback will just randomly pause. Like after 5 seconds, pause. I hit play and the song will play for ~ 10-20 seconds and pause again. Sometimes I do this twice and the song plays through other times it‚Äôll pause 5 times in a row until I just give up. I have many downloaded songs on my phone, they pause too, so it‚Äôs not the connection. I have googled every potential fix from community support, I‚Äôve re-installed the app several times, signed out of every instance on every device and after about a day the pause bug comes back on every platform I use.

I am giving up and switching to Apple Music; this player is not worth $10/month if it is buggy and the devs can‚Äôt seem to figure it out.

title: Used to be way better
text: This app used to be simple and easy to use and i used to be able to see recently played music witch was great. Now i cant see it anywhere, its gone, no recently played music anywhere. I dint want to have to search or dig through a thousand albums to find the ones I usually listen too. If i want to listen to something else i look it up but i stick with 20 albums for a few weeks and i like to have them right there. Then when i start to switch i can look them up and then have them in my recently played until i either stopped listening too it or removed it, cause i used to be able to choose what was there. And also the made for me is has been exactly the same since I downloaded the app like 3 years ago. But i dont even like any of the stuff they suggest and it literally hasn‚Äôt changed. They always suggest the same old music thats so typical. I listen to just about every genre of music i just cant stand radio music, i like different types of stuff and more going on then some guy on his computer. But they just suggest the same old stuff that ive never enjoyed and i dont want to.

title: Son of a Glitch
text:
Okay so yes this has free music and is amazing. And yes of course they‚Äôre going to bombard me with ads for premium. Totally understandable. But holy cow this app can be pretty dang glitchy. I always make sure it automatically updates, and I still have problems. 

I‚Äôll be playing music, and it won‚Äôt show up on my lock screen for my iPhone XS Max. This could be an Apple problem, but all my software is up to date so I kind of doubt it, but who knows. What I do know, is that about half the time the ‚Äútap now for 30 minutes ad free music‚Äù doesn‚Äôt work. I‚Äôll be at home connected to good WiFi, or out on the road with perfect cellular, and I‚Äôll tap on the link to watch the ad for 30 minutes ad free music, and an error for ‚Äúcan‚Äôt open link‚Äù pops up. Or, even more frustrating, I‚Äôll click on it, it‚Äôll pull up a video...and then 2 more follow it, and 3 songs later I have more ads. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating. 

Hoping future updates will fix this soon.

title: MORE SKIPS!! (Or no more adding songs to playlist, I‚Äôm fine with either).
text: I love this app, and am currently using it while I write this review. This app is great and I really have no complaints, other than how I don‚Äôt really care for how it adds random songs to my playlist, sometimes, there will be good songs that it adds that I‚Äôm like ‚Äúoh, why didn‚Äôt I think of adding that?‚Äù And then there‚Äôs a time when I have to waste one of my 6 free skips that I have. So, mainly, I have a problem with not having enough skips to get through those songs I don‚Äôt want in my playlist in the first place. I‚Äôm not sure if this is an option when you get a subscription, (I do know you get skips), but it will be much easier if the app just didn‚Äôt add random songs that I never wanted in my playlist. SO MAYBE JUST PLEASE MORE SKIPS? OR MAYBE JUST NO ADDING RANDOM SONGS IN THE FIRST PLACE? VERY DESPERATE HERE!

title: Order of songs played on my ‚ÄúLiked songs‚Äù
text: I never had troubles with this app until now. Usually if you press a song (without shuffle on) it would just go down the order of ‚ÄúRecently added‚Äù or however ‚Äúyou‚Äù have your songs listed. Now if you press on a song and go all the way through that song it won‚Äôt go in the order it‚Äôs supposed to, it‚Äôll take you back to the song all the way at the top of the list which is the last song ‚ÄúI‚Äù added to my list. (My Order of songs is on ‚ÄúRecently added‚Äù) so imagine if I‚Äôm in the middle of the list of my songs it‚Äôll take me to the last song i added which is at the very beginning of my list. And if I ever had my music on Shuffle it wouldn‚Äôt shuffle every song that‚Äôs in my list. It will shuffle every song within this small gap instead of shuffle my songs from the very top of the list to the very bottom. Is it just because I have too many songs liked or is it just because of the app. Help me out please it‚Äôs really annoying and I‚Äôm not the type of person to write reviews or bad things.

title: its okay.
text:
1st problem, the limited skips. on iphone you have 6 or 7 skips per hour. thats bull. so if you just dont like a song on ur playlist that day, you have to use a skip.
2nd problem. the recomending songs. instead of playing the playlist over again it gives u recomended songs. i understand the idea of that, but idk its just not executed well.
3rd problem, playing a playlist over again is too much work. ok so if a playlist just ended and u wanted to listen to it again, you cant click ‚Äú shuffle play‚Äù again, you have to play another playlist, then click shuffle play on that playlist, then go back to the playlist you want to play again THEN click shuffle play. 
4rth problem. THE AMOUNT OF ADS. OMG THERE ARE TOO MANY. there are ads dor every 8 songs i think, but theres a skip ad button and even if u click the button that says ‚ÄúSKIP‚Äù WICH YOU WOULD EXPECT TO SKIL THE AD, IT DOESNT AND JUST PLAYS THE AD. anyways, overall the app is good, but if u have the opportunity to have apple music instead, go with apple music.

title: Could be better
text: I love listening to music and being able to create a playlist of songs I enjoy, but there have been a few downsides. On my phone so can‚Äôt listen to just one song if I want to. It either has to come up on shuffle or I can‚Äôt listen to it. Another issue is the previewing songs when adding them to a playlist. What‚Äôs the point in making a playlist if I can‚Äôt even hear what the song is. Losing this feature just makes the app a bit more useless in my opinion. I honestly don‚Äôt care for the adds but I do dislike that it plays the ad and then another for 10-15 seconds saying that I won‚Äôt be interrupted for 30 minutes. If you just left it at one ad I wouldn‚Äôt get so irritated for it taking up so much time. Overall though it is nice to listen to music I enjoy and it‚Äôs great that it has access to so many songs I really just wish I could preview them.

title: It‚Äôs ok I guess...
text: Here‚Äôs the positive side of you what I think. I LOVE this app it‚Äôs like a library o f songs and podcasts I do recommend this app and it‚Äôs free other than Apple Music. I just love it how you have a kid‚Äôs  version so it‚Äôs safe. I just don‚Äôt know how to explain how good this app is! Now I will be moving to the negative side but it‚Äôs not a lot of problems. First of all why do you add songs to my playlist like I didn‚Äôt ask you like I‚Äôm not trying to be rude but I don‚Äôt know any songs that you added. I‚Äôm pretty much picky about stuff that I don‚Äôt have a lot of interest of since I‚Äôm making a playlist that includes hip hop and beats but I don‚Äôt have a lot of interest of hip hop since it‚Äôs kind of negative to me. But it‚Äôs ok since I have to add more songs in order for the app not to add more songs to my playlist.                                     If the dev or anyone  reads this thank you and I hope you have a good day and add this feature.

title: Love it but,,,,,,,,
text: I don't have that many complaints. I really like this app. But,,,,,,there's a REALLY big problem. Its randomly skips songs, changes playlists, and kicks me out of the app and I didn't touch anything. Thats a problem. Also, it keeps pausing randomly when I don't want it to. And it keeps making this very, very strange noise randomly and I can't do anything. And I have to constantly log out so it won't happen when I'm not on. And one more thing. Whenever I close the app, it would still play music even though I CLOSED THE APP. And these things don't happen once in a while. These things happen EVERY SINGLE DAY.I updated the app and even deleted it and reinstalled it to see if that would fix it but no luck. Maybe it's a glitch? Maybe it's a bug? Maybe my hacker/stalker/FBI agent is trolling me? Or maybe it's something else that the people who run this app need to fix, I don't know. But please fix it or else I'll have to delete it permanently or I might break my phone out of anger. So yeah. Please fix it. üòëüíÖüèæ

title: Mmm
text: So, one it won‚Äôt even let me install the app on my iPad, it keeps saying an unknown error has occurred please try again. So I do, and it still doesn‚Äôt work. Two, the actual app has way too many ads, for example there is one that says ‚ÄúTap now to get 30 minutes with no ads‚Äù so obviously I click it while thing ends, I listen to my song, and boom. Ad. Right there in the middle of my listening. Three, I feel like you don‚Äôt have enough skips or that there is something in the algorithm that makes it so you have all of the songs you don‚Äôt want to listen to and then you land on a song you hate (if that makes any sense at all) I believe it‚Äôs only 5 skips but even still. Four, I don‚Äôt like how it just takes a short playlist of your, say 5 songs, and when you play it, it plays ‚Äòsuggested songs‚Äô. I have a playlist so that I can listen to all the songs I want one right after the other, not so that you can just be like oH hEy, LeTs PlAy ThIs SoNg nOw. Anyway, I probably have more to complain about,I just can‚Äôt think of it off the top of my head.

title: New Update
text:
I have used this app for over 6 years and loved it, but I am not a fan of the new update. By only being able to preview my profile, I can‚Äôt easily see which playlists I have made public. 

Also, really not a fan of the intrusive song suggestions. When you had them as a recommendation list at the bottom, that was cool. I could listen to them when I felt like it and decide if I wanted to include them. They shouldn‚Äôt be automatically played as part of my playlist if you don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs long enough. Even if my playlist is just two songs, those are the only two I should hear. 

There are times you want to look for new music and times when you just want to ruminate over two songs. I should let you know when I want that, not the other way around. I pay for premium, so even though I know you are trying to promote artists that have paid to be seen, my subscription should allow freedom to listen to what I want.

title: Good but ads need some work
text: It‚Äôs great! It gives you the lyrics and you can find every song in here and I love it and use it all the time. But it feels like they‚Äôre really trying to force you to get premium. Because the ads are unbearable. They come up like after every 3 songs and usually there‚Äôs about 2 30 second ones, and it always says that if you watch it it‚Äôll give 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening. Haven‚Äôt ever tested that, but from what it felt like it certainly did never felt like 30 minutes. Every time I have my playlist on an ad comes on I just leave the room and go grab a snack or something. So I would love it if they were able to just maybe allow some shorter ads. There are a few like five second ones, but they‚Äôre rare. But I would recommend! Especially if you can afford the premium.

title: Great app however
text: I‚Äôve had for about 5 or 6 years and it‚Äôs a great app‚Ä¶ however I notice sometimes every once in awhile that it‚Äôll not let you see all the songs in your playlist now I know this is feature for non paying customers but please make it so everyone can have it because as someone who listens to music about 80% of her day I don‚Äôt have the time to skip songs I don‚Äôt like every other song, especially since I don‚Äôt pay for premium. Now you could see all the songs in a playlist three weeks ago so change it back in my opinion you‚Äôre going to gain more listeners that way. I would‚Äôve given this a five star review if it would‚Äôve been kept as it was I really hope you read this review and change the app back so everybody can see the songs in their playlists and just premium customers because in my opinion that‚Äôs valuing a certain set of people more.

title: I love this app but...
text: This app is amazing, I can listen to all my favorite songs when I want and it‚Äôs great for taking long trips that I have to drive which I do very often. I also love using it while doing homework. There are only two downsides to this app. Lately when it offers the 30mins of unlimited listening without adds and I click to watch the add it just goes right back to my music and doesn‚Äôt let me listen without adds. The other thing is that I don‚Äôt have the money to pay for the monthly Prime. I‚Äôm only 16 I don‚Äôt have a job or a bank account that I can pay for the unlimited music. Yes, I understand that they have to have some way to pay for the app to still be up I just wish there was another way for me to get the unlimited music without adds and be able to listen offline. But other than those two things I love this app and would recommend it to anyone.

title: It‚Äôs not good unless you pay
text:
Upon downloading, you can get a free trail of premium features for 14 days, which I was 1. Unaware of and 2. Never asked for, and didn‚Äôt want. Once it ended, though, I was notified with a pop-up saying my free trail had ended. That was when things immediately went downhill; when you play a song, it will add numerous other songs that will play instead. It will never play the song you asked it to. I tried searching on the internet for answers, when I found out that it was because I had my ‚Äúshuffle‚Äù button on, but when I looked further into it, I realized that was a premium feature that I had to pay for. You can‚Äôt even upgrade to premium if you wanted to because you can only upgrade on their website.
 It wasn‚Äôt a good experience‚ÄîOverall, it was OK, for the first TWO WEEKS.

title: Great App but Preview Feature Is Gone!
text:
I love this app. It‚Äôs my primary music platform and has been for years now. I‚Äôm a premium subscriber and think it‚Äôs a great value for what you get, at least if you listen to even half as much music as I do (which is a lot, admittedly, but still...$10 a month of unlimited access to all songs, all playlists I or any other user has ever created, etc, all for the price of a single iTunes album? I used to buy at least one and sometimes tons more each month on iTunes. Now I pay $10 and that‚Äôs it. Nice. 

So why only 4 stars? They took my beloved Preview feature away. I loved being able to tap and hold on a particular song and hear a good 30 seconds of it without actually having to add it to the queue or play it all the way through. Or tap an album and preview most or all of the songs on it before committing to actually playing everything in full. It was great. And I want it back. Please?

title: It can‚Äôt remember that you have listened to a podcast!
text:
Listening to your fav songs multiple times is fine. BUT a podcast is different! I want to hear stories from the beginning in order. And once I have listened, it should go to the next episode. Ones I have listened to 6 months ago with no new episodes are suggested again!!!!! And you can‚Äôt Dismiss ones you don‚Äôt like. Some are an accidental touch and now they stay in the list. I pay for this for now so please improve the postcast experience! I don‚Äôt want to make a playlist of podcasts that are already a list. I would also like to be able to see the date of the episode more easily, since I listen to podcasts that started years ago and have hundred of episodes. Needs work, seems like not much testing happening. 
UPDATE: the ability to skip a season in a podcast would be great. Marking 15 episode as played is not optimal.

title: More inventory please
text:
Lots of great playlists but I often find some of my favorite albums and those songs are not included. Love the ‚Äúthis is...‚Äù playlists, but often they do not include the best songs from an artist. Search function is mandatory but is quite slow and clunky. You have to spell names exactly right and complete. Anticipatory window should be included to speed search. I don‚Äôt like the 30 second preview on my phone at all. Make it a buried option, not the first thing that comes up. But I love the fact this works independently on my Roku tv. I will likely upgrade to premium after finding employment. Thanks for providing to us free for those of us who can‚Äôt afford it... great service!
Have now updated to premium. Still love it. Wish the Roku and iPhone apps worked now the same way. But it‚Äôs getting better all the time!...

title: Issues with auto play unresolved
text: Don‚Äôt know what triggered it but I had a premium account and out of nowhere, although I keep all my apps updated and my iOS system on my XR updated, auto play just decides not to work or work only sometimes. Customer support won‚Äôt solve my issue and I‚Äôve reached out 4 times and not been followed up with. Tried deleting cache, deleting and redownloading the app and even setting up a new account. I pay for premium and expect auto play to keep working and playing songs after I search and play a song-this is how I discovered many new artists before I started running into this issue about a month and a half ago where it just flat out stops playing after one song. Ignored by customer service and not followed up with either when they say they‚Äôll ‚Äúhand it off to the specialty team.‚Äù Even worse that their service dept doesnt have a co-browse solution so I can screen share and show them exactly what I‚Äôm talking about, nor describe it over the phone since there‚Äôs no number to call.   At my wit‚Äôs end here and will likely move over to another streaming platform. N

title: It‚Äôs a 5 star but I have to give it a 4
text: I use this app and prefer it over Apple Music. I‚Äôve had premium for as long as I can remember and it‚Äôs so nice. Finding new music is easier than Apple Music because you can click a song and hit go to song radio or album radio and it suggests songs like it and that‚Äôs how I discover more. Only reason I give it 4 stars is that recently the app has been crashing while I‚Äôm listening and that has never happened before but now it‚Äôs happening more often and it‚Äôs really annoying all I have to do is reopen the app and play the song and it‚Äôs fine but I wish I didn‚Äôt have this problem :/ anyways I highly suggest this music app I don‚Äôt think anything else compares I love my playlists and i love that I‚Äôve discovered all my favorite songs through this app actually I'm going to give it 5 stars.

title: PLEASE stop fixing what isn‚Äôt broken
text: Devs constantly push awful UI updates for no reason that are so bad and poorly thought out. Been a customer for a long time‚Äînearly 10 years now and I‚Äôve never been so close to deleting my account for good. As of the current version, there is a share button right above the song‚Äôs play bar and I constantly am pushing the button on accident when seeking through the current track around the middle of the song. Another gripe, why put the song album art in two places, the big one in the center of the screen and another smaller one right above it in the upper left corner of the screen? It‚Äôs aesthetically unpleasant and clutters the screen which further cramps the space needed  for actual functioning buttons (like the share button mentioned previously). Nonsensical UI updates that serve no purpose but to anger users leave me no choice but to not recommend this app as the go-to for a premium music-listening experience as it used to be.

title: Love it but I really would like this fixed‚Ä¶
text:
I have used this app for years but I am getting tired of a few things. 1: I love to listen to my likes songs, but it is hard to enjoy it because at the end of my playlist, it plays suggested tracks which are usually inappropriate or dark. I really hate having to listen to a playlist that I know is good but that I don‚Äôt want to listen to at that moment. 2: I am fine with ads. I have never had a problem with them but, sometimes it feels like I am watching 10 ads to listen to 1 song. And the ads I have to listen to are stuff like California Scratchers, which isn‚Äôt interesting to an underage teen. It would be nice if there could be a little less ads and not to repeat the same ad over and over again. 
Thank you if you read this, and please fix these issues. I love to listen to music but I have nowhere else to enjoy it. üé∏

title: Switching to Apple Music
text: The only pro about this entire app (isn't much tbh) is that there are podcasts that are exclusive to the app. I can't listen to a song that I want, because when I tap it, it plays 3-8 completely unrelated songs before. If I put songs into a playlist, it won't let me listen to them until it has played at least 4 other recommended songs. Sometimes the genres of the songs will be completely different too. And I can't listen to any song without having to hear an ad that says I'll be able to "enjoy the next 30 min of ad-free music" which comes up again after 1-2 songs. The Daily Mix's would be a nice feature since you can skip and select songs that aren't on shuffle, if only it didn't remove songs from them if I listened to them too much. I'm tired of putting up with this trash app. It tries to annoy you into paying, but I'd rather not pay such a joke of a company. Oh, and another thing, they pay their artists 57% less than what Apple pays their artists, and Apple Music has way more artists on their platforms.

title: Bug
text:
I‚Äôve used this app for about 9 years and recently for a few weeks my songs have been stopping half way and I have to open back up the app to play the song from the beginning. This has happened multiple times when trying to listen to one song. Also the ads that say click to watch a video for 30 min free ads have been popping up within 2-3 songs without me skipping. Not sure if this helps but I‚Äôm using an iPhone 11 pro. 
     Aside from the bugs it‚Äôs not cool that we can‚Äôt pick and choose songs we want on the phone, that we have to wait till the song randomly shuffles into our playlist. Or when we choose the song we want other related songs play fist before we get to the song we are trying to choose. 
     On computer it‚Äôs great, I can get through 15 minutes worth of music until I hear an ad and I can skip 6 times till another ad appears, then skip some more. Also on computer you can choose the song you want to hear right away.

title: Great app! But one minor inconvenience...
text: This app is great and I would recommend it to anybody who loves music. There‚Äôs just one small part that is annoying me a lot. Recently, the music has been stopping randomly in the middle of songs. It started happening little by little. A song would play stop once then never again. But now, I played a song 5 times and it stopped again. What I mean by stopped is, that it would be like the app closed, but the tab was still there. That annoyed me a lot because every time I‚Äôm doing something on my phone while listening to music, it would stop. Then I‚Äôd have to leave the app and play it again. Also, every time I played the song again, it wouldn‚Äôt start from the beginning. It would start a second in, then two seconds, then three and etc. Please fix this bug! Over all though, I love this app! Keep up the good work!

title: This is the best music app
text: I really like this music app, I don‚Äôt really mind that they give me like 4 or maybe less advertisements because I can just walk away and get a snack or play a game on my phone while it‚Äôs playing or just something that can make not even pay attention to the ads if I make a playlist and only play music on my playlist it actually plays all the music that I add to my playlist if. I don‚Äôt have premium. I have family premium so my whole family can  listen to there music freely and we really enjoy it with this premium you can play any song you want, you don‚Äôt get ads, you have unlimited skips and you can download the whole playlist you have and play it without in internet if you download them so you could listen to them on a airplane ‚úàÔ∏è. I hope if you download this app you like it‚ù§Ô∏èüòä

title: Pretty good
text: I love this app and out accessible it is. It has many good qualities about it like the way you can make your own playlists and customizable features. Also, the perks for premium is pretty good and I definitely enjoyed it. The only things that I find not amazing is the untimely advertisements especially when they‚Äôre long and disruptive. I‚Äôve experienced many abrupt occurrences due to them and as much as these advertisements are so the app can still provide us with free and unlimited amount of music I feel there could definitely be a way to make less loud or annoying kind of adds pop up especially when u are listening to something calm/going to bed. MAYBE even adding a sleep advertisement mode so that the adds that we do receive are softer and quieter that way it isn‚Äôt disruptive to the listener! Overall great app and will continue to use it for daily use üòäüòä

title: Honestly pretty mad right now
text: I paid for premium which I have had before, but for some reason it‚Äôs not letting me queue music and it‚Äôs not even playing any of my songs at all when I‚Äôm on a playlist or if I pick a song out. I wasted 10 dollars on this app, and probably won‚Äôt be doing it again because honestly it was better before the premium. I got it to skip the ad, but it ended up messing my whole account up. I redownloaded the app thinking maybe that was the issue but it‚Äôs not. It‚Äôs really upsetting because this was my favorite music app, and now it‚Äôs all just a complete joke. It‚Äôs tried playing modest mouse at least 5 times, and I skip it every time and still continues to insist that I listen to it. I was on a heavy metal playlist, think suicide silence and parkway drive type of thing. Why the heck, is modest mouse playing? I‚Äôve never even shown interest in that band, even before this. Like seriously? Am I crazy? I thought the whole point of premium was no adds, and to play the music you want when you want. But the that was false. Straight rip off.

title: LOVE IT! BUT JUST ONE THING!!
text: I absolutely love the app. Everything from recommending songs to me, keeping steady playlists for me to listen to, to updating music all the time. I HAVE TWO RECOMMENDATIONS! One, I would absolutely love it if there was a faster option to add music to your own PERSONAL playlist, as I love to create my own personal playlist for family and friends to listen to. On occasions, I frequently add music in playlists but usually end up being time inefficient. I was wondering if there was a faster way? And 2, for my own personal playlists, I would like to separate it from other playlists I follow from >Playlists >Music >Playlists. If possible, I would highly recommend having playlists you follow in a separate category and having your own personal playlists in their own category. That way it‚Äôll be way more organized on keeping a clean plate if that makes sense. Thanks!

title: Downloads don‚Äôt work
text: So I‚Äôm paying for the family plan for two reasons: to listen to music without ads and to download podcasts to listen to even when I don‚Äôt have signal. At first it worked perfectly fine and I had no issues with listening to my downloads offline. However, recently it has not let me play my downloads. Half the time they don‚Äôt even appear even though I‚Äôm 100% sure I downloaded them the night before and it appears that they have been successfully downloaded. Whenever they do decide to appear they still lag and don‚Äôt play smoothly. Most times they‚Äôll stop in the middle and won‚Äôt continue to play which infuriates me because this is why I downloaded them to avoid this issue. It only happens with my podcasts and not all the songs I have downloaded so I don‚Äôt understand what the issue is. I would‚Äôve given 5 stars if it weren‚Äôt for this issue but due to this major inconvenience I give it 3.

title: Extra LOUD ads on app
text:
The app is great with a fantastic selection of music in all languages and genres, unfortunately it is ruined by sometimes obtrusive and extremely LOUD commercials, that are not only louder than the music but have obnoxious and painful dynamics. 

One commercial in particular has a woman loudly going PSSSS!!! PSSSS!!! as though whispering into your ear, only extremely loudly and with very painful sibilance.  It happens after a brief period of silence and if you are listening to gentle music it will make you jump in pain. My ear is ringing now and I wasn‚Äôt even using headphones or listening loudly on my tablet. Others have specifically complained about this commercial for at least two months and it is criminal that it is still being used. 

The FCC made this practice illegal for TV advertisements and it‚Äôs shameful that companies need to be forced into following common decency by legislation, rather than ensuring that both the listener and advertisers can live together in harmony.  What is the point in having commercials if the listener is going to tear out their headphones in pain or mute the volume in disgust?

title: Amazing App just two issues
text: I love this app and as a premium subscriber it suns even better. However, there's been a really annoying glitch that doesn't allow me add more songs to a playlist I just created. The number of songs isn't even the issue because it will simply not register my tap and if it does it will freeze and not add the song to the newly created playlist. This has been going for a few weeks now. Apart from this there use to be an amazing preview feature that allowed you to press on a song without playing or queuing it and it'd give you a 30 second preview of it-please bring this back it saved a lot of time. Aside from these issues though I strongly recommend this app, especially if you decide on premium. You can listen to your favorite songs in any order while offline and while traveling (airplane or road trips).

title: Free skips
text: I love this app but I hate how I do like two skips and then it says that I have to pay for more skips but I really don‚Äôt want to. So I was wondering if you could change that or something. I know you probably can‚Äôt but it makes me really mad. But I do live this app, also some of the songs I do search on here don‚Äôt come up and I was just wondering why. Ok I Guess that‚Äôs all, I really just wanted to say something about the skips they just make me so mad when I skip two songs and there it says that I have to pay for more skips but the bad things about it is when I first got the app it was letting me have all the skips I want or it just let me pick a random song to play and now I can‚Äôt even do that, it only plays have of the song and I‚Äôm like omg nooooooo. But hopefully you read this and understand what I‚Äôm going through, and I know you need money and stuff but stilllllll come one, help a girl out. And your probably not going to read this anyway but please help meee! Thank you üôè üòä.

title: THIS IS GETTING ANNOYING
text:
The app is good I mean I always have my headphones on and I‚Äôm listening to music but my playlist that has at least 3 hundred songs it always switches to a different radio and it makes me mad and also when it says watch this video to get 30 mins of add free music I watch it but like 1 or 2 songs after o watch that there is a ton of adds and it gets annoying and I don‚Äôt have premium and six skips honestly isn‚Äôt enough bc after I use all them there is a song that I envoy but at time it gets annoying but it is always on and I feel like there should be 10 skips but other then I love third app ALSO WHAT MAKES ME SO MAD IS WHEN IM LISTENING TO MUSIC ON MY HEADPHONES IT TURNS OFF MY MUSIC AND WHEN IM PLAYING ROBLOX WITH MY FRIENDS WHEN IT SHUTS OFF I HAVE TO LEAVE THE GAME JUST TO TURN IT ON BUT YET WHEN I HAVE MY SLEEP PLAYLIST ON AT NIGHT WITHOUT
MY HEADPHONES IT DOESN'T TURN OFF AND IT IS SO ANNOYING EVEN MY COUSIN HAS THAT PROBLEM AND I HAD THIS AT 4 STARS BUT NOW I FEEL LIKE THREE STARS BC OF THIS!!! (sorry caps, realized that half way done and was like i‚Äôm to lazy to retype it so i gave up) :P

title: Seriously?..
text: I wrote a review on this app about a year ago saying that this was a great app. Well, I still love this app and listening to music on it, however.. There‚Äôs a serious issue here. I have a few different playlists with about 15+ songs on it so that it doesn‚Äôt play suggested songs along with the regular songs. It was working while I was working on things, but then the playlist was done and over with and randomly started playing different ‚Äúsuggested‚Äù songs. (which are songs i don‚Äôt like listening to anyways) I understand you guys need money, but why is it necessary to randomly switch to different songs? (which have nothing to do with the songs on my own playlist)It would be fine if I was able to switch to another playlist with the songs I actually have on them. But no, it‚Äôs still recommended songs even though I haven‚Äôt even played that playlist? That‚Äôs what‚Äôs really unnecessary. This is why i‚Äôve stopped using the app anyways, I can‚Äôt keep listening when it randomly switches to different songs.

title: ZERO STARS until further NOTICE!.!.!
text: The last couple of updates are nothing more than a nuisance! I used to love this app, I didn‚Äôt care if it was on a premium account or free but the last few updates made using the app a little unbearable in a few ways. There‚Äôs NO LONGER a ‚ÄòMY SONGS‚Äô TAB which makes the app less pleasurable to use. I can no longer see SPECIFIC SOMGS under an artist WITHOUT HAVING to FOLLOW the artist and LIKE ALL of their songs. I literally go to my ‚ÄòARTIST‚Äô TAB and DON‚ÄôT see ANY of the songs I like, and I‚Äôm FORCED to play ALL of the artist‚Äôs songs INSTEAD of the many that I only LIKE by the artist. I DON‚Äôt want to HAVE to make a PLAYLIST every time I want to hear only 23 of the 84 tracks from a single artist it‚Äôs RIDICULOUS. It also PLAYS the EXACT same SONGS over and over even when in shuffle. The updates took over half of my songs away and I‚Äôm LIVID. And it RANDOMLY plays songs and artists that have NOTHING to do with the playlist or genre I‚Äôm TRYING to listen to. This app needs to return back to it‚Äôs former glory I‚Äôve been really fighting for this app. People try to sway me over to PANDORA but I DON‚ÄôT want to resort to using that crud.

title: Sexist/Racist Against Women
text: I used to love this app but the trashy sexist/racist artists and their garbage lyrics that belittle and have no respect for the female gender need to go. This treatment and app violates the constitution. Sorry but don‚Äôt give me the ‚Äúfreedom of expression‚Äù excuse here. An app that pushes and supports discrimination, but especially towards women is supporting a backwards society where women have been bashed and trashed since the beginning of time, and nothing has changed, and is just getting worse. Do you not have mothers, daughters, sisters, grandmothers? Do you not respect nor love and respect them? Apparently not. This treatment has no place in this alpha male, machismo society. It‚Äôs repulsive and hugely toxic, and is the model for future abuse of women. What the youth of today sees now paves the way for how they treat women in the future. If everyone is screaming racism these days, women should be at the very top screaming the absolute loudest. It‚Äôs about time. This app is appalling to me and turns my stomach, literally. Wish I could name these artists here. Asking Apple to remove less than stellar reviews is a known thing now. So I‚Äôll be watching.
